name: Pineapple (Thbop)
description:
Collect pineapples, how hard could it be? It's really simple guys.

Welcome to Pineapple, a short little platformer. Bounce along 4ish levels with death lurking at every corner, but its okay: the pineapples are worth it. It also has sound (you like sound right?).

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

Z to jump
